response.improvementExplanation: The map operation on an RDD can be replaced with a DataFrame/Dataset operation, which can take advantage of Spark's Catalyst optimizer and provide better performance and scalability. Additionally, DataFrames/Datasets can reduce shuffling and improve resource usage.

dataframeEquivalent.description: This code creates a DataFrame from the input data and joins it with the broadcasted states dictionary. The result is collected as a list of tuples.

benefits: Improved performance due to Catalyst optimizer
Reduced shuffling and improved resource usage
